parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the logging configuration to be updated.

parameters.name: destinationConfiguration
parameters.description: A complex type that contains a destination configuration for where chat content will be logged. There can be only one type of destination ( cloudWatchLogs, firehose, or s3) in a destinationConfiguration. s3 (dict) --- An Amazon S3 destination configuration where chat activity will be logged. Name of the Amazon S3 bucket where chat activity will be logged. cloudWatchLogs (dict) --- An Amazon CloudWatch Logs destination configuration where chat activity will be logged. Name of the Amazon Cloudwatch Logs destination where chat activity will be logged. firehose (dict) --- An Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose destination configuration where chat activity will be logged. Name of the Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream where chat activity will be logged.

nested_params.name: s3
nested_params.description: An Amazon S3 destination configuration where chat activity will be logged.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket where chat activity will be logged.

nested_params.name: cloudWatchLogs
nested_params.description: An Amazon CloudWatch Logs destination configuration where chat activity will be logged.

nested_params.name: logGroupName
nested_params.description: Name of the Amazon Cloudwatch Logs destination where chat activity will be logged.

nested_params.name: firehose
nested_params.description: An Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose destination configuration where chat activity will be logged.

nested_params.name: deliveryStreamName
nested_params.description: Name of the Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream where chat activity will be logged.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: Logging-configuration ARN, from the request (if identifier was an ARN).

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: Logging-configuration ID, generated by the system. This is a relative identifier, the part of the ARN that uniquely identifies the room.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: Time when the logging configuration was created. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: Time of the logging configuration's last update. This is an ISO 8601 timestamp; note that this is returned as a string.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Logging-configuration name, from the request (if specified).

nested_items.name: destinationConfiguration
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains a destination configuration for where chat content will be logged, from the request. There is only one type of destination ( cloudWatchLogs, firehose, or s3) in a destinationConfiguration.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket where chat activity will be logged.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchLogs
nested_items.description: An Amazon CloudWatch Logs destination configuration where chat activity will be logged.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon Cloudwatch Logs destination where chat activity will be logged.

nested_items.name: deliveryStreamName
nested_items.description: Name of the Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream where chat activity will be logged.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the logging configuration. When the state is ACTIVE, the configuration is ready to log chat content.
